block.comment:
This is an example System-of-Systems (SoS) block named "example_block", on the work-space.
You may: 1. Drag the block/work-space with the mouse. 2. Minimize / Maximize / Partially minimize a block by double clicking on it. 3. Drag and drop new blocks from the Toolbox from *left* hand side. 4. Add related blocks to this block by clicking (+) drop-down below. 5. Right click on the block/work-space to see a menu. 6. Close this *comment* by clicking on the (?) button.

block.field: Running Distance between 7 cm and 9 cm

block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. SoS : Kilobot platooning
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Dependability guarantee : Starting Position = Straight line 2. Dependability guarantee : Starting distance = 5 cm
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Dependability guarantee : Running distance = 5 cm

block.field: The leader is decided before execution
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : leader_uid
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : leader_uid
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Message Exchange
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Controller messaging
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Kilobot program load
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUPI : Calculate Distance
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Message Exchange
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Message : Leader Notify

block.field: Any kilobot can enter the platoon
Only last kilobot can leave the platoon

block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Expected and beneficial behaviour : Unique Platoon
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : kilo_ticks
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : Message Exchange
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Dependability guarantee : Motors spinup duration = 1000 ms
